name: GetProfitAndLossReport
description:
Retrieve profit and loss report from Xero.

Call this tool to obtain detailed profit and loss reports for financial analysis.

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: The Xero identifier for the tenant. Required to specify which tenant's data to access.

value_schema.description: Xero identifier for Tenant

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter the report by the starting date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g., 2021-02-01.

value_schema.description: filter by the from date of the report e.g. 2021-02-01

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter by the end date of the report in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g., 2021-02-28.

value_schema.description: filter by the to date of the report e.g. 2021-02-28

parameters.name: number_of_comparison_periods
parameters.description: The number of periods to compare, must be an integer between 1 and 12.

value_schema.description: The number of periods to compare (integer between 1 and 12)

parameters.name: comparison_timeframe
parameters.description: The period size to compare to for the report. Options are MONTH, QUARTER, or YEAR.

value_schema.description: The period size to compare to (MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR)

parameters.name: tracking_category_id
parameters.description: The first tracking category ID for the Profit and Loss report filter. Expect a string representing the tracking category identifier.

value_schema.description: The trackingCategory 1 for the ProfitAndLoss report

parameters.name: secondary_tracking_category_id
parameters.description: The ID of the second tracking category for the Profit and Loss report.

value_schema.description: The trackingCategory 2 for the ProfitAndLoss report

parameters.name: tracking_option_1_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the first tracking option in the Profit and Loss report.

value_schema.description: The tracking option 1 for the ProfitAndLoss report

parameters.name: tracking_option_id_2
parameters.description: The second tracking option identifier for filtering the Profit and Loss report.

value_schema.description: The tracking option 2 for the ProfitAndLoss report

parameters.name: return_standard_layout
parameters.description: Set to true to return the Profit and Loss report in the standard layout.

value_schema.description: Return the standard layout for the ProfitAndLoss report

parameters.name: return_cash_basis_only
parameters.description: Specify true to return the Profit and Loss report on a cash only basis.

value_schema.description: Return cash only basis for the ProfitAndLoss report
